title: Stop grabbing images
content:
My phone often grabs images for advertisements for games.
(When I use an app that has advertisements my phone will save some images)
They don't show up anywhere on my phone itself but when I upload my images onto my laptop there are tons of thumbnails of these add. Most of my pictures and all of these add don't actually have a picture on the thumbnail just an X so I have to upload all images then go through and delete all these screwy grabs...can anyone help?
